item.title: Aries Chen
item.description: Hello! My name is Aries Chen, and I’m a dedicated student at the China University of Petroleum, specializing in Geophysics. My academic journey is deeply rooted in the exploration of the earth’s physical properties, but I’ve recently taken a keen interest in the realm of Artificial Intelligence. I’m currently engaged in AI-related research, focusing on how these advanced technologies can be applied within geophysical studies to unveil new insights and efficiencies.
